data.text: @HumzaYousaf Joking about the detriment you caused to my industry is not a good look.
@HumzaYousaf I took full advantage  of covid restrictions  managed  to avoid  a funeral saved me talking to a bunch of arseholes.

@HumzaYousaf Are you actually tweeting this? We here nothing about the rising waiting times, the morale and staff shortages. We here no explanation on the rising cases and hospitalisations despite having the strictest measures, and you try to make light of your own stupid rules. Class👍🏻🙈🤡
@Echo_of_hope @HumzaYousaf @johnnie_mc @scotgov Put a mask on if you're worried.
@HumzaYousaf What an idiot “yes government, please take my liberty away”. I swear these people aren’t real. MORE RESTRICTIONS? Yeah, cause that’s what scotland fucking needs
@HumzaYousaf Actual fucking lols. This is beyond his remit. #humzatheclown #racistsforindy #snpaedos #paedofc
